name: FindTheTreasure
description: when you find the treasure you get teleported to the next level CONTROLS: Press escape on your keyboard to go in the menu and thats how you can resume and quit. :How to play Right click on the game and click launch Game. Saving: press 1 to save and press 2 to go back to where you last saved you game DO NOT SAVE THE GAME ON ANY OTHER LEVEL ONLY SAVE ON LEVEL ONE!
